segments.text: The open window lets in such a calm view of the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but compare the peace outside with the impending disaster in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels wrong that such a serene day is marred by the chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes piled high next to the sink seem to echo the turmoil, almost shaking as the water pulses over them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I realize she’s caught up in the mundane, perhaps her escape from the outside world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a stark contrast, isn’t it?
segments.speaker: PAR
